core.facade

Class AdminFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.facade.AdminFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class AdminFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    This class is intended to consist of all the methods available for an administrator of the coupon system. It includes business logic operations that can be changed at any time.

      This method will delete the company completely and absolutely, including it's coupons that are already purchased and those which are available to buy.

      void updateHistory(ClientTypes clientType, java.lang.Object updatedUnit, long oldID)

    • Method Detail

      • createCompany

        public void createCompany(Company company)
        This method uses company DAO to create a new record in the database. It will throw an exception if company's name or id have been already registered.
        Parameters:
        company -

      • removeCompany

        public void removeCompany(Company company)
        This method will delete the company completely and absolutely, including it's coupons that are already purchased and those which are available to buy. Use it wisely.

      • updateCompanyExceptName

        public void updateCompanyExceptName(Company company,
                                    long oldCompanyID)
        This method allows to administrator to upgrade company's records, except of it's name.

      • getCompany

        public Company getCompany(long id)
        This method prints company records onto the server screen and returns with a company object if needed.
        Parameters:
        Companyid -
        Returns:
        Company object

      • getAllCompanies

        public java.util.Collection<Company> getAllCompanies()
        This method prints the list of all companies onto the server console and returns with a collection of company objects for further use.
        Returns:
        A Collection of companies that are registered in database.

      • createCustomer

        public void createCustomer(Customer customer)
        This method creates a new customer record in the database. The name and id parameters are checked by the SQL, and if not unique, an exception will occur.
        Parameters:
        customer -

      • removeCustomer

        public void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
        This method deletes the customer and his purchase history completely. Use with caution.
        Parameters:
        Customer -

      • updateCustomerExceptname

        public void updateCustomerExceptname(Customer customer,
                                     long customerOldID)
        This method updates all customer parameters, except of his name. It also updates purchase history so it will answer to a new customer parameters.
        Parameters:
        Customer -

      • getCustomersCollection

        public java.util.Collection<Customer> getCustomersCollection()
        This method will allow to administrator to look through all the customers;
        Returns:
        All Customers List

      • viewCustomer

        public Customer viewCustomer(long id)

      • login

        public AdminFacade login(java.lang.String login,
                         java.lang.String password)

      • deleteCustomersHistory

        public void deleteCustomersHistory(long customerID)
        This method deletes purchase history of the given customer. It is a part of a business logic and can be changed or deprived at any time.

      • updateHistory

        public void updateHistory(ClientTypes clientType,
                          java.lang.Object updatedUnit,
                          long oldID)
        This method will update purchase/or creation history of the coupon, in case if customer or coupon or company's status has changed.
